data.title: Great Food, Average Service
data.text:
First off, the food is a home run. The variety of burgers is enough to satisfy anyone's cravings, and they even have the central Illinois famous shoes--which are my personal favorite. The beer selection is great. The food is absolutely awesome and for that I'll keep coming back. 
However, the service needs some work. My family and I walked in where there were 2 employees standing behind the bar, with no acknowledgement, then a female employee rounded the corner, saw us, then walked behind the bar as well. As my father walked up to the bar to ask for a table a gentleman rounded the corner and offered to seat us. Also, the waitress wear their hair down, which when our waitress gave us our drinks there was a soft drink on her tray for another table, and when she leaned to pass us our drinks her hair got into the soft drink on her tray. Which she then gave to the patron at the next table. A few kinks to iron out... but great food and local sports atmosphere I will come back for.

data.title: A New Gem for Decatur
data.text: Our party of six had dinner on a Friday evening.  We each ordered a different item.  All of then were excellent.  The wait staff was very friendly and helpful.  Definitely recommend trying this.

data.title: Can't Beat the Location, Service & Burgers!!
data.text: Owner, Matt Sites, did a wonderful job reviving The Wharf in South Shores so we were excited when he took over this downtown spot. And he has done another AMAZING job! The burgers are to die for--I can only eat half the meal but am blessed to have the leftover the next day at work! The staff are friendly and attentive. Walked out through the patio and what a nice area--will have to eat out there on my next visit and hopefully it won't be long!!!

data.title: Best new spot in Decatur!
data.text:
We have dined here many times since they opened.  Everything we have ordered has been fantastic!  Love the beer selection and absolutely the best patio dining in Decatur.
It's a relaxed atmosphere & fun to look at all the memorabilia from all our local teams.
Service is always prompt & friendly.  They have a Bloody Mary Bar on Sundays which offers tons of options.  Our new favorite spot!!

data.title: A Homerun For Decatur
data.text: Locals 101 is a sports bar-restaurant featuring local teams.  The food is the best offered in downtown Decatur.  Salads, burgers, chicken, fries, wings and great drinks.

data.title: Awesome burger
data.text: Went out with the wife for dinner to Locals 101 I had the curb ferguson which was one of the tastiest burger I have had in a long time.  The wife ate the buffalo chicken horseshoe add it was also delicious and very filling she might have ate a 1/4 of the meal.  All in all great food and atmosphere.

data.title: Locals 101 Bar & Grill Definitely Worth A Visit
data.text: Saturday, 18 – June, 2016 my wife and I enjoyed a pleasant dinner at Locals 101 Bar & Grill, Decatur, Illinois.  Overall the staff is young, enthusiastic, and friendly.  This establishment is somewhat sports themed and incorporates local artifacts.  Patrons from the area can dine and bask in the vestiges of their lost youth.  Overlooking yet another sports themed bar and grill in Decatur proper and the surrounding area, the menu offers a wide variety of fare from which to choose, as well as a unique selection of bottled and draught beer.  This particular evening my wife selected an open-face chicken cordon bleu served on a baguette and accompanied by a copious amount of French fries.  I selected a bourbon-molasses glazed salmon filet and roasted red potatoes, paired with a Founders IPA.  We were both particularly pleased with the quality and portion size of our entrees.  Locals 101 Bar & Grill is definitely worth a visit and highly recommended.
